definition: to go and come back/to make a return trip/backwards and forwards (e.g. of piston or pump action)/to reciprocate (of machine part)
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
backwards and forwards action (e.g. of piston or pump)/reciprocating motion

sentences.english: Anticline and monocline are major trap types.
sentences.chinese: 主要的類型是往復式活塞發動機。

sentences.english: To produce the pumping action, it contains pistons that are driven back and forth, or rotating vanes.
sentences.chinese: 要生產泵動作用，它包括往復運動的活塞或旋轉葉片。

sentences.english: Characteristic extraction is a key step in the condition monitoring and fault diagnosis of reciprocating pump.
sentences.chinese: 特徵提取是往復泵狀態監測及故障診斷的關鍵環節。

sentences.english: And then when that child has children, wash, rinse, and repeat (in hot water, of course).
sentences.chinese: 當子女又有了孩子，漿洗等等，又是循環往復的事情。

sentences.english: It does not feel good, and it is like running around the playground, circularly, constantly.
sentences.chinese: 這感覺糟糕極了，就像是繞着運動場循環往復地奔跑。

sentences.english: Support Vector Machines-based approach is presented for fault diagnosis of valves in reciprocating pumps.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種基於支持向量機的往復泵泵閥故障診斷方法。

sentences.english: Double-action and back and forth once every two to complete action suction drainage.
sentences.chinese: 而雙作用式每往復一次完成兩次吸排水動作。

sentences.english: A novel two way briquetting structure with two reciprocating pistons was designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計的往復活塞雙向擠壓成型機構具有創新性。

sentences.english: The hydraulic profile control and water shutoff pump is a hydraulic driven reciprocating pump with double cylinders and single action.
sentences.chinese: 液壓調剖堵水泵是一種液壓驅動的雙缸單作用往復泵。

sentences.english: Special sliding setting, stable running stroke, accurate stripping & cutting.
sentences.chinese: 獨特式滑座，往復行程平穩，切剝精準。

sentences.english: An approach to the fault identification of pump valves of a reciprocation pump by wavelet transform is presented in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 探討了小波變換在往復泵泵閥故障識別中的應用。

sentences.english: The paper deals with the theoretical calculation of reciprocating seal for three-plunger pump.
sentences.chinese: 本文敘述了對三柱塞泵往復密封的理論計算。

sentences.english: Obstruction or vibration in the movement of roving traverse.
sentences.chinese: 粗紗導紗器的往復運動不靈活或振動。

sentences.english: The rainfall is governed by weather patterns that move in annual cycles.
sentences.chinese: 降雨量受氣候模式控制，一年一次循環往復。

sentences.english: Rongli Mud Pump belongs to the modern triplex single acting reciprocating pump.
sentences.chinese: 榮利泥漿泵爲三缸單作用往復泵。

sentences.english: The main elements of a reciprocating compressor are the piston and cylinder.
sentences.chinese: 往復式壓縮機的主要零件是活塞和氣缸。

definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
unit of area equal to 100 畝|亩[mu3] or 6.67 hectares/a short while/a little while ago/circa. (for approximate dates)
